## integration-boilerplate-api package

`api-client` for Vue Storefront 2 integration bolierplate.

## Remarks

In here you can find all references to the integration API Client.

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Context](./integration-boilerplate-api.context.md) | Global context of the application which includes runtime integration context. |
|  [Endpoints](./integration-boilerplate-api.endpoints.md) | Definition of all API-client methods available in [context](https://docs.vuestorefront.io/v2/advanced/context.html#context-api)<!-- -->. |
|  [MiddlewareConfig](./integration-boilerplate-api.middlewareconfig.md) | Settings to be provided in the <code>middleware.config.js</code> file. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BoilerplateIntegrationContext](./integration-boilerplate-api.boilerplateintegrationcontext.md) | Runtime integration context, which includes API client instance, settings, and endpoints that will be passed via middleware server. This interface name is starting with <code>Boilerplate</code>, but you should use your integration name in here. |
|  [ContextualizedEndpoints](./integration-boilerplate-api.contextualizedendpoints.md) | All available API Endpoints without first argument - <code>context</code>, because this prop is set automatically. |
